channel.title: Age of Ravens: Checking the RPG Library
channel.description: On the Gauntlet Blog I go through my stack of recent rpg purchases to figure out what's hot, what's actually going to get to the table, and what the mix says about my gaming these days. I'd be curious about what others have in their queue. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/checking-the-rpg-library-age-of-ravens

item.title: Age of Ravens: Checking the RPG Library
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

On the Gauntlet Blog I go through my stack of recent rpg purchases to figure out what’s hot, what’s actually going to get to the table, and what the mix says about my gaming these days. I’d be curious about what others have in their queue.

THE GAUNTLET

Checking the RPG Library: Age of Ravens

Throughout the quarantine, I’ve found it weirdly harder to sit down and read rules. I’m not alone in this—we’ve discussed this on the Gauntlet Slack with others corroborating my experience....

Read full topic
item.source: Age of Ravens: Checking the RPG Library
